Title: Relates to the appointment of the rent guidelines board member representative of tenants
Summary: Relates to the appointment of the rent guidelines board; requires a member representative of tenants to be appointed no later than 60 days after a vacancy; prohibits meetings until such time.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-510, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the appointment of the rent guidelines board
